be.ac.ulb.infof307.g04.model.client

Class LikesStatCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g04.model.client.LikesStatCommunication

  • public class LikesStatCommunication
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an "interface" that let us communicate with the server in a REST way.

      • insert

        public int insert(java.lang.Integer userID,
                  java.lang.Integer signalisation_id,
                  java.lang.Integer stat_type)
        This method sends an HTTP request to the server in order to insert a likeStats in the database.
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the user.
        signalisation_id - The ID of the signaling.
        stat_type - The type of like.
        Returns:
        The response code of the server (typically 200 for OK, 500 for server error, etc.).
